item.description:
Boston Couples, its the first Friday night of Spring and how better to celebrate then with a night of bowling in a happening location.  Jillians on the same block as Fenway Park has 3 levels of bars, games and bowling plus there are a ton of lively bars near by to go to after words.

The cost is $6 per game and approximately $4 for shoes.  Even if you don't want to bowl still come and hangout with us it will be fun.  This event is being co-hosted with Ex-Midwestern meetup group so its a great opportunity to come and meet some new people you may not have had a chance to meet.

This is 145 Ipswich in Boston right by Fenway so its right of the Greenline(Kenmore stop) for people taking the T or there are blocks of street parking around and since the Sox are not playing yet you should have pretty good luck finding a spot.

Please RSVP as soon as possible because there is limited space.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the front lobby at the Bowling Level
item.why: Everybody loves to hang out and bowl, ok maybe most people love to "roll some strikes"! But I know everybody loves to hang out in a fun social setting and Jillians is great. Three levels with bars, games and lots of drinks! Plus its Friday night!
item.name: Bowling at Jillians by Fenway-Friday March 25th 6:30
